name: scrappy
caption: Scrappy

effect.short: Lets the Pokémon's []{type:normal} and []{type:fighting} moves hit []{type:ghost} Pokémon.
effect.full:
This Pokémon ignores []{type:ghost}-type Pokémon's immunity to []{type:normal}- and []{type:fighting}-type moves.

Ghost Pokémon's other types affect damage as usual.

flavorText:
The Pokémon can hit Ghost-type Pokémon with
Normal- and Fighting-type moves.
